Posts.Content: I had a mastectomy to my right breast in May 2016, I have just had my right breast reduced and now awaiting diep flap reconstruction to my right breast. My consultant advised a sports bra to support the slightly reduced left breast.Â  Having measured best I can I'm still showing as a 40f, but hard to measure as there is nothing on my right side, how on earth can I get this accurate?
Posts.Title: What size bra
